dismissalText.commentary: Wessly Madhevere b Fazalhaq Farooqi 5 (18b 1x4 0x6) SR: 27.77

dismissalComment.html: well.. well.! Madhevere shimmies down to nullify the swing but in the process he left a huge gap between pad and bat. Farooqi sees the shimmy and shortens the length a bit. Madhevere on the move wasn't committed to the shot he was aiming, the ball nips in, takes the inside edge and the leg pole goes for an early walk

dismissalText.commentary: Innocent Kaia lbw b Mujeeb Ur Rahman 16 (40b 2x4 0x6) SR: 40

dismissalComment.html: loud cry for leg before and given. This was a googly, pitched outside off, spat back in. Kaia on the back foot was playing for the one which would leave him but this one came back in to thump the pad. Kaia challenges the decision. Replay confirms it would have hit the top of middle. Zimbabwe lose another wicket and a review

commentTextItems.html: drops it short, Nabi rocks back and pulls well in the air over the midwicket fence, finishes off in style.

commentPostTextItems.html: Afghanistan pick up 30 points in this series in the World Super League. They win by 4 wickets. A comprehensive win. It was a difficult wicket to play today, extra bounce and the players took a few blows. Hashmatullah Shahidi with 38 runs and Nabi with 34 runs completed the win for Afghanistan. For Zimbabwe Muzarabani and Chatara were the pick of the bowlers. Rashid Khan is the Player of the Match. "We bowled in the right areas". Rahmat Shah is the Player of the Series. Thanks for tuning in, do join us again for the T20 series.

commentTextItems.html: cuts it well behind point and Chatara does well diving to his left, good stop that.
stays back and punches to the onside.
sweeps well to deep backward square leg, Madhevere running around does another great fielding, slides and then pulls the ball in.
fuller and flicked through midwicket, Madhevere runs around to field the ball.
